description: Submission of details pursuant to Condition 1.30 of Section 73 Planning Permission F/04687/13 dated 23 July 2014 for the redevelopment of the Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration Scheme to make minor amendments to the existing definition within the Glossary to Conditions of the s73 decision notice for Zonal Floorspace Schedule, namely to incorporate revision No. 6, submitted in association with Condition 2.4 Condition discharge (LPA ref 22/2946/CON) to make amendments to the Zonal Floorspace Schedule to facilitate the transfer of floorspace between Use Classes Business (Class B1) and Community Facilities (Class D1) within Station Quarter Development Zone.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
